snippet: The supermini, scheduled to arrive in showrooms in August, will forgo the CD player in favor of Web-based audio and an input jack for portable music players.
abstract: The supermini, scheduled to arrive in showrooms in August, will forgo the CD player in favor of Web-based audio and an input jack for portable music players.

headline.main: In Bid to Win the Wired Gen-Y Buyer, Chevy Spark Ditches the CD Player
